• Streaming arrayYou control the x and y values and you get back a stream of z values. This is basically reading the GeoTIFF as a stream
  • File readerDrag and drop a file onto the panel. It's not overly optimised but you can try it out by downloading Mount Kosciusko GeoTIFF and dragging the saved file onto the page.
  • Render data provided in x, y, z format. It merges back the reolutions and cell width to give full x, y, z values per point.
  • Render data provided in GeoJSON format. Basically the same as the last data delivery but this time each point is a geojson feature that is a point of three dmensions.
